00048 typedef struct minipair {
00049     unsigned int source;
00050     unsigned int target;
00051 } MINIPAIR;
00052

00082     bool static pairSort(const struct minipair c1, const struct minipair c2) {
00083         if ((c1.source) < (c2.source))
00084             return true;
00085         else {
00086             if ((c1.source) > (c2.source))
00087                 return false;
00088             else {
00089                 if ((c1.target) < (c2.target))
00090                     return true;
00091                 else {
00092                     if ((c1.target) > (c2.target))
00093                         return false;
00094                     else
00095                         return false;
00096                 }
00097             }
00098         }
00099         return true;
00100     }
00101 
00102     int static FindTransition(const vector<minipair> vocabularies, const int id) {
00103         int pos = -1;//to indicate not found
00104         int l = 0, r = vocabularies.size() - 1, c = (l + r) / 2;
00105 
00106         while (l <= r) {
00107             if (vocabularies[c].source == id) {
00108                 pos = c;
00109                 break;
00110             }
00111             if (vocabularies[c].source < id)
00112                 l = c + 1;
00113             else
00114                 r = c - 1;
00115             c = (l + r) / 2;
00116         }
00117         return pos;
00118     }
00119 };
